# Government Tender Announcement
**Tender Title (English):** EW699-240381 – Great Bear Lake Camp Support
**Tender Title (French):** EW699-240381 – Services de soutien du camp au Grand lac de l'Ours

**Publication Date:** 2023-06-13
**Tender Closing Date:**
> **Deadline:** June 20th, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT
> **Note:** Please disregard previous deadlines. All required documentation and bids must be submitted by June 19th, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT.

**Procurement Details:**
* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price

**Project Overview:**
This tender is selectively tendered to EW479-192534 supply arrangement holders for remediation construction services. However, suppliers without a supply arrangement may take advantage of the ongoing opportunity for qualification at [Canada Buys website].

The objective of this procurement is to provide camp support and field support services for activities on the Great Bear Lake site, including camp opening, operation, maintenance, and closure. This requirement is subject to the Sahtu Dene and Metis Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement and the Tli?cho Land Claims and Self-Government Agreement.

**Contracting Entity Information:**
* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User:** Crown-Indigenous Relations and Northern Affairs Canada (CIRNAC)
